seo.metaDescription: Custom injectable cocktails break down stubborn fat, improve circulation, and smooth cellulite. Minimal downtime body contouring in Marylebone.

schema.howPerformed: After mapping dimpled and fatty areas, we inject a custom cocktail using ultra-fine needles and micro-cannulas: (1) Deoxycholate solution breaks down fat cell membranes so the fat is naturally eliminated via lymphatic drainage; (2) Polynucleotides stimulate collagen and improve microcirculation to tighten skin; (3) Vitamins and amino acids support tissue repair. We use a grid pattern for even distribution. Lymphatic massage techniques complete the session. Treatment takes 30-45 minutes per area
schema.preparation: Stay very well-hydrated for 3 days before (drink 3+ liters daily). Avoid alcohol and salty foods for 48 hours. Wear comfortable, loose clothing you don't mind getting slightly stained. Come ready for visible swelling—it's dramatic but temporary. Arrange light activities for 2-3 days after
schema.followup: Drink lots of water to support lymphatic drainage. Gentle walking encouraged from day one. Use compression garments if treating large areas. Avoid intense exercise, alcohol, and saunas for 5 days. Manual lymphatic drainage massage at day 3-5 enhances results. Expect swelling, bruising, and tenderness for 3-7 days. Attend 6-week review to assess and plan additional sessions if needed
schema.outcome: Over 4-8 weeks, dimples gradually smooth out as fat cells shrink and skin tightens. Thighs and hips appear more contoured. Circulation improves. Skin texture becomes silkier. Results are lasting with stable weight and healthy lifestyle. Most people need 3-4 sessions spaced 6 weeks apart for optimal smoothing
schema.medicationRequired: Topical numbing cream. Injectable lidocaine mixed with solution for comfort
schema.treatmentFrequency: 3-4 sessions spaced 6 weeks apart for initial treatment. Maintenance session yearly if weight stable
schema.adverseOutcome: Significant swelling and bruising for 3-7 days (expected). Tenderness for one week. Temporary hardness or lumps that massage out. Small bruises. Very rarely, infection or skin irregularity
contraindication: Taking blood thinners without medical clearance
Severe obesity (treatment works on localized pockets, not general weight loss)
typicalTest: Pinch test to assess skin elasticity and fat thickness
clinicalFindings: Stubborn fat pockets resistant to diet/exercise
Desire for body contouring without surgery

description: Bespoke injectable cocktails combining fat-dissolving enzymes, polynucleotides, and collagen stimulators to contour thighs, hips, and abdomen.

faq.question: Will I need time off work for cellulite treatment?
faq.answer: You can resume office work immediately. Expect visible swelling, bruising, and tenderness for 3-7 days—most noticeable days 2-3. Light walking is encouraged to support lymphatic drainage.

faq.question: Is cellulite treatment suitable for all body types?
faq.answer: Best for pinchable fat pockets and cellulite grades 1-3 with good skin elasticity. Not suitable for general obesity or very severe cellulite. During consultation, we'll honestly assess if alternative treatments would work better for you.

faq.question: How many cellulite treatment sessions do I need?
faq.answer: Most patients need 3-4 sessions spaced 6 weeks apart for optimal smoothing. Results build progressively with each treatment. Maintenance sessions yearly help sustain results with stable weight.

faq.question: Does cellulite treatment hurt?
faq.answer: You'll feel stinging and warmth as the solution works. We use topical numbing and lidocaine in the solution for comfort. Tenderness continues for about a week afterward. Most patients rate discomfort as moderate but manageable.

faq.question: How much does cellulite treatment cost in London?
faq.answer: Single sessions are £450. The 3-Session Sculpt is £1,200 (save £150). The 6-Session Transformation for advanced cellulite is £2,200 (save £500). Consultation, mapping, and lymphatic massage guidance included.

faq.question: When will I see cellulite reduction results?
faq.answer: Results appear gradually over 4-8 weeks as fat cells shrink and skin tightens. You'll notice progressive smoothing with each session. Final results are visible 6-8 weeks after your last treatment.

faq.question: Are cellulite treatment results permanent?
faq.answer: Results are lasting with stable weight and healthy lifestyle. The treated fat cells are destroyed permanently. However, remaining cells can enlarge with weight gain, and new cellulite can form without lifestyle maintenance.

faq.question: What areas can you treat for cellulite?
faq.answer: We commonly treat thighs (inner and outer), hips and love handles, abdomen, upper arms, and buttocks. Each area is mapped individually with customized cocktails based on fat thickness and cellulite severity.
